wallawiegege

he is perple very tall. bother of wario below. he has a up side down L on his cap.

wario

wario is very fat. he is yellow. brother of waluigiabouth. he has a W on his cap.

Luigi

luigi is green the brother of MARIO below. has a L on is cap (right way round). he play the game luigi hontid manshon.

the best of all

mario

mario weres a red cap with a M on his cap. he has a itallian axent. mario is the mane person on the game. he is the brother of luigi above this.
